typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouthridgeOrders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouthridgeOrderDetails
SouthridgeOrders, SouthridgeOrderDetails join(SouthridgeOrders@OrderID == SouthridgeOrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(GlobalOrderID = nextSequence(),
		SourceSystemID = 1) ~> AddingColumn
AddingColumn select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = SouthridgeOrders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = SouthridgeOrders@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SouthridgeOrders@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		CreatedDate = SouthridgeOrderDetails@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SouthridgeOrderDetails@UpdatedDate,
		GlobalOrderID,
		SourceSystemID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
